game.name: Stumble Guys
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Racing, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: 혼돈 속으로 뛰어들 준비 되셨나요? Stumble Guys는 최대 32명이 함께 달리고, 점프하고, 넘어지며 웃음을 선사하는 빠른 속도의 멀티플레이 파티 배틀 게임입니다. 장애물 가득한 코스를 돌파해 마지막까지 살아남는 단 한 명이 되어보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ready for the chaos? Stumble Guys is a 32-player, fast-paced multiplayer party royale where players dash, jump, and fall across hilarious obstacle courses in a fun race to be the last one standing.

reviewHighlights.text: Game is filled with bots instead of real players. Most of the achievements are broken. Knockoff fall guys. 1/10
Koş , zıpla, savun , insanları trolle , hedefe ulaş ve kazan.. Tatlı renkleri ve görsellikleriyle , abidik gubidik kıyafetleri ile sizlere Minnoş bir...
